author: Wojciech Zylm
title: Green Hydrogen: The Cornerstone of Industrial Decarbonization
text:
In an era where the clamor for sustainable energy solutions is louder than ever, a new chapter unfolds in the quest for environmental stewardship. The spotlight shines on green hydrogen, hailed as a beacon of hope in the energy transition journey. At the heart of this revolution are electrolyzer plants, with Hitachi Energy at the forefront, championing the development of medium to giga-scale facilities. This initiative is not just about innovation; it's a testament to the collaborative spirit, as seen in Hitachi Energy's partnership with H2 Green Steel in Sweden. Their joint venture aims to revolutionize steelmaking by reducing CO2 emissions by a staggering 95 percent through the use of green hydrogen in a direct reduction plant.
The American Drive Towards Industrial Decarbonization
The United States is not lagging in this global race towards decarbonization. The US Department of Energy recently earmarked $171 million to fuel projects dedicated to slashing industrial greenhouse gas emissions and cultivating decarbonization technologies. Among these projects is a groundbreaking initiative in Toledo, Ohio, boasting a $10 million investment. Spearheaded by the University of Wisconsin-Madison, this project proposes a novel integration of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell with an industrial direct reduction shaft furnace. The ambition is bold yet clear: to produce direct reduced iron with at least a 90% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions, aiming for a production capacity of 1.6 million tons per year.
Germany's Leap with the tkH2Steel Project
Across the Atlantic, Germany is making its own giant leap with the tkH2Steel project, orchestrated by Thyssenkrupp. This initiative is groundbreaking, with plans to operate a direct reduction plant fully on hydrogen by 2029. The project's centerpiece features two innovative melters, symbolizing a significant leap towards decarbonization in steelmaking. The hydrogen requirement for this venture is currently under a transparent and broad-based tender process. Notably, this project has garnered substantial support, with funding of around 2 billion euros from the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Protection and the state of North Rhine-Westphalia.
Embracing a Greener Future
The journey towards a sustainable future is laden with challenges, yet the collective efforts of nations and corporations indicate a promising path forward. The collaboration between Hitachi Energy and H2 Green Steel, the proactive initiatives by the US Department of Energy, and Thyssenkrupp's ambitious tkH2Steel project are exemplary milestones in this quest. These endeavors not only highlight the potential of green hydrogen as a pivotal force in energy transition but also underscore the importance of global cooperation and innovation in combating climate change. As the world continues to navigate through the complexities of decarbonization, these projects serve as beacons of hope, illuminating the path towards a greener, more sustainable future.

author: Tony LaBrie
title: A Deer Got Hit and Landed in Your Michigan Yard-Now What? - NewsBreak
text:
Michigan
A Deer Got Hit and Landed in Your Michigan Yard‚ÄîNow What?

author: Lilly Larkin
title: Northern Lights spotted as far south as Essex
text: [UK News](https://thethaiger.com/world/uk/) Northern Lights spotted as far south as Essex Stunning aurora sightings across the UK, including Essex and Northern Ireland Photographs captured tonight show the Northern Lights as far south as Essex. The Met Office stated that parts of the UK had a ‚Äúdecent chance‚Äù of witnessing the aurora borealis. Sightings were expected to be most frequent in Scotland and Northern Ireland, with possible appearances in northern England and the Midlands. Images shared with the Mirror reveal stunning aurora displays from Westcliff-on-Sea, Essex. A photograph taken by Jon Gillespie showcases a vivid red across a clear sky. Other notable images show the phenomenon from Whitby in North Yorkshire and near Keswick in Cumbria. The Mirror has compiled a gallery of the best pictures taken tonight. The Met Office forecast relatively clear skies across much of the UK, enhancing the likelihood of visibility. A spokesman noted increased space weather events, including the Northern Lights, due to the sun nearing its solar cycle peak. The [#northernlights]were visible across much of the country last night, but they were also visible from space, as shown in this low light satellite image üëáWith the [#aurora]showing up as a pale yellow ribbon of colour across northern latitudes[pic.twitter.com/42msqNrIjZ]‚Äî Met Office (@metoffice) [October 11, 2024] Stephen Dixon from the Met Office mentioned the possibility of visible auroras across parts of the UK from Thursday night into early Friday. He acknowledged ‚Äúsome uncertainty‚Äù about the exact timing of visibility. Dixon explained that aurora sightings were likely in Scotland and Northern Ireland, with potential sightings in northern England and the Midlands. He added that a camera with long exposure could capture auroras even further south. Clear skies over much of the UK, except for parts of western Scotland, increased the chance of visibility. Residual viewings could be possible over the weekend, mainly in Scotland. However, rain and cloud could obscure visibility, making Thursday night the primary focus for aurora sightings. Auroras, commonly seen over high polar latitudes but visible in parts of the UK during geomagnetic storms, are influenced by solar activity. The sun‚Äôs 11-year solar cycle, with peak sunspot activity known as solar maximum, leads to potential Earth-directed energy bursts called coronal mass ejections, which cause auroras. Dixon noted the sun is nearing the peak of its solar cycle, resulting in more recent space weather events. Prediction centres, including the Met Office Space Weather Operations Centre, expect the solar maximum later this year or early next year. Even after the solar cycle peak, Northern Lights sightings in the UK remain possible. As the cycle progresses, space weather events will gradually decline but won‚Äôt cease entirely, allowing for future aurora sightings. Aurora displays occur when charged particles collide with gases in the Earth‚Äôs atmosphere around the magnetic poles. These collisions emit light at various wavelengths, creating colourful displays in the sky. What Other Media Are Saying - inews highlights stunning pictures of Northern Lights illuminating UK skies, captured in Buckinghamshire, Kent, and London, showcasing a spectacular display of aurora borealis. [(read more)](https://inews.co.uk/news/northern-lights-pictures-uk-3318933) Frequently Asked Questions Here are some common questions asked about this news Can you see the Northern Lights in Essex? Yes, recent photographs show the Northern Lights in Essex. When is the best time to see the Northern Lights in the UK? Thursday night into early Friday, with clear skies enhancing visibility. Where in the UK are the Northern Lights most likely to be seen? Scotland, Northern Ireland, and possibly northern England and the Midlands. Why are there more Northern Lights sightings now? The sun is nearing its solar cycle peak, increasing space weather events. Can you still see the Northern Lights after the solar cycle peak? Yes, sightings are still possible as the cycle progresses, though less frequent.

author: Roberto Formigoni
title: Anche a Natale, il silenzio dell'Occidente sui cristiani perseguitati ‚Äì Libero Quotidiano
text:
Roberto Formigoni 24 dicembre 2023 a a a √à Natale, milioni di cristiani nel mondo si apprestano a rivivere la nascita di Ges√π. Ma quanti sono i cristiani che non potranno farlo perch√® minacciati, perseguitati, imprigionati? Torno sul tema della persecuzione dei cristiani perch√® le cifre del 2022 sono di gran lunga superiori a quelle degli anni precedenti, e in continuo aumento.
E altrettanto doloroso √® che tutto ci√≤ capiti nell‚Äôindifferenza del mondo libero, di noi cristiani o laici d‚ÄôOccidente. Secondo la Fondazione vaticana che studia la libert√† religiosa e le sue violazioni, nel 2022 oltre 5.200 cristiani hanno pagato con la vita la loro fede, almeno altrettanti sono stati rapiti, e pi√π di 4.500 sono stati arrestati e detenuti. Inoltre, pi√π di duemila fra chiese ed edifici religiosi sono stati rasi al suolo. Tra le nazioni che v√¨olano di pi√π la libert√† religiosa vi sono quelle pi√π popolose del mondo, dalla Cina all‚ÄôIndia, al Pakistan, al Bangladesh, alla Nigeria. E questo fa s√¨ che quasi cinque miliardi di persone soffrano, direttamente o indirettamente, di violazioni della loro libert√†.
Quest‚Äôanno anche agli estremi confini orientali dell‚ÄôEuropa, un popolo √® stato costretto all‚Äôesodo a causa della sua fede cristiana: sono gli abitanti del Nagorno- Karabakh, armeni, colpiti dalla persecuzione per opera dell‚ÄôAzerbaigian e del dittatore Aliyev, con cui troppi paesi d‚ÄôOccidente fanno affari basati sul petrolio. E praticamente nessuno ne ha parlato.
Ecco, il silenzio dell‚ÄôOccidente √® un fatto doloroso su cui riflettere. Ormai l‚Äôidea che qualcuno possa accettare di morire per non abiurare alla propria fede √® qualcosa che stride con il relativismo culturale e politico che domina nelle nostre societ√†.
Accettare il fatto che 120mila cristiani della piana di Ninive in Iraq abbiano abbandonato le loro case e tutti i loro averi pur di non rinunciare alla propria identit√† e alla fede cristiana, √® qualcosa che l‚ÄôOccidente, anche l‚ÄôOccidente cristiano non comprende pi√π. Perch√®? Perch√® ha relegato la libert√† religiosa a un livello inferiore rispetto a libert√† ritenute pi√π moderne, pi√π alla moda, come la libert√† sessuale o la libert√† di genere. √à questa la beffa pi√π clamorosa peri nostri fratelli d‚ÄôOriente, spesso perseguitati perch√® considerati amici dell‚ÄôOccidente, mentre noi occidentali scegliamo di ignorarli. E cos√¨ i cristiani vanno scomparendo dalle terre d‚ÄôOriente: in Siria, del milione e mezzo censiti nel 2010 ne sono rimasti poco pi√π di 500mila, in Iraq, del milione e mezzo presenti nel 2000, ne sono rimasti 150mila. E, contemporaneamente alla scomparsa dei cristiani, questi paesi si spostano dalla nostra sfera di influenza a quella della Cina. L‚Äôassenza cristiana √® diventata il simbolo della nostra irrilevanza globale. ¬© RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA.

author: Daniela Flores
title: Lanzan Clinic ISEP programa de atenci√≥n psicol√≥gica gratuita y en l√≠nea en Sinaloa
text:
La Universidad ISEP lanz√≥ el proyecto Clinic Isep enfocado en brindar atenci√≥n psicol√≥gica gratuita y en l√≠nea a personas de Sinaloa derivado de la crisis de inseguridad que se vive desde hace casi tres meses.
La subdirectora General, Nayeli Tamayo, se√±al√≥ que debido a que las cifras nacionales arrojan que el 25 por ciento de la poblaci√≥n que sufre alg√∫n trastorno mental como ansiedad o depresi√≥n no recibe atenci√≥n adecuada el programa se extender√° a todos los estados de la Rep√∫blica.
‚ÄúAunque lo lanzamos con un enfoque en Sinaloa debido a la situaci√≥n o a la problem√°tica que actualmente estamos atravesando, este programa ser√° accesible para cualquier persona en M√©xico que desee, que necesite atenci√≥n psicol√≥gica‚Äù, indic√≥.
Detall√≥ que el programa estar√° a cargo de m√°s de 2 mil estudiantes de maestr√≠a en Psicolog√≠a Cl√≠nica con experiencia profesional como parte de sus pr√°cticas profesionales y que a su vez ser√°n supervisados por sus coordinadores.
‚ÄúUniversidad ISEP es una instituci√≥n de formaci√≥n superior y de intervenci√≥n cl√≠nica reconocida como una de las m√°s importantes de M√©xico y de Am√©rica Latina. Tenemos alrededor de 40 a√±os de trayectoria donde hemos formado a m√°s de 35 mil profesionistas con nacionalidades de m√°s de 45 pa√≠ses y hemos brindado atenci√≥n cl√≠nica a m√°s de 20 mil pacientes a trav√©s de nuestros programas de pr√°cticas profesionales‚Äù, indic√≥.
‚ÄúLa mayor√≠a de nuestros estudiantes est√°n en el resto del Pa√≠s y en algunas otras regiones de Am√©rica Latina, entonces forman parte de este programa la mayor√≠a de nuestros estudiantes, es la raz√≥n por la que garantizamos que podemos cubrir una poblaci√≥n bastante elevada en cuanto a la atenci√≥n, pero no est√°n en solamente en Culiac√°n, en Sinaloa, sino tambi√©n forman parte del resto de la Rep√∫blica‚Äù.
El proyecto arrancar√° el pr√≥ximo 9 de diciembre y quienes requieran la atenci√≥n deber√°n llamar al n√∫mero de tel√©fono: 800 20 49 932 para agendar una cita en la que decidir√°n si prefieren las sesi√≥n por llamada telef√≥nica o videollamada. Las l√≠neas telef√≥nicas estar√°n atendiendo de 8:00 a las 20:00 horas.
Carolina Araujo, coordinadora de Vinculaci√≥n, recalc√≥ que los estudiantes ya tienen una experiencia previa y tienen una base de licenciatura en Piscolog√≠a pero adem√°s est√°n estudiando una especializaci√≥n del √°rea de psicolog√≠a, como terapia de parejas, infanto-juvenil o adultos, entre otras especializaciones.
En el caso de requerirse atenciones a infantes, estos deber√°n llevar el proceso acompa√±ados por adultos.
‚ÄúQueremos garantizarles que este acompa√±amiento, que es sin costo, que es por estudiantes pero son por profesionales que vamos a asegurar que sea un acompa√±amiento que sea profesional y √©tico para garantizar a todas las personas que se acerquen a tener esta atenci√≥n, pues esta garant√≠a‚Äù, apunt√≥.
‚ÄúAhora mismo, las circunstancias que estamos viviendo en Culiac√°n y en el Estado pues realmente es un estado de alerta, de miedo y de incertidumbre, por eso estamos convencidos de que necesitamos herramientas para generar esa resiliencia y como sociedad poder dar una actitud y una respuesta positiva de la mejor manera‚Äù.
Durante esta primera fase de apoyo, se comprometieron a dar 15 sesiones terap√©uticas por persona, pero si el paciente requiere m√°s sesiones se les brindar√° a fin de terminar una primera etapa de atenci√≥n psicol√≥gica.
‚ÄúSi en alg√∫n momento se tienen que extender esas sesiones pues sigue siendo sin ning√∫n costo, al final realmente nuestro objetivo es poder dar esa experiencia pr√°ctica a nuestros estudiantes, que ellos puedan tener una cercan√≠a con las realidades que est√°n viviendo nuestra sociedad‚Äù, asegur√≥.
